noodles.name: Hakka Noodles
noodles.description: Indo-chinese veggie hakka noodles with boiled eggs (optional)
instructions: Julienne carrot, capsicum and onion and finely chop scallions, ginger, garlic and green chillies.
Heat oil in a wok/ pan and saute ginger, garlic and green chillies for a minute.
Add in the sliced veggies and cook them on high heat for 5 minutes, tossing regularly.
Boil 4 cups of water and salt in a pot and cook the noodles for 8-10 minutes.
Drain the noodles and add them with the vegetables.
Add in soy sauce, vinegar and sesame oil to the noodles and season it with salt and pepper.
Garnish with scallions and optionally serve it with boiled/fried eggs

pizza.name: Chicken Pan Pizza
pizza.description: Pan-made Pizza topped with marinara sauce, chicken, veggies and cheese!
instructions: To prepare the marinara sauce, first blanch the tomatoes, remove their peels and blend them to a paste.
Heat oil in a pan, add in 2 finely chopped onions and cook them on medium heat till it sweats.
Add in diced garlic, red pepper flakes and saute for a couple of minutes.
Add in blended tomatoes and the tomato paste and cook on low heat till it thickens.
Season it with salt, pepper and dried oregano as per taste. The sauce for pizza is ready.
Heat some oil in a pan and add diced chicken and cook on medium heat.
When it is almost done, add in a diced onion and any vegetable topping of your choice.
Cook them on the highest setting so they develop a char. Season with salt and pepper.
In a thick pan, add some butter and place the pizza crust on it.
Spread our prepared sauce and add in the toppings and cheese.
Close the lid and let it bake for 5-10 minutes till the cheese melts.

pasta.name: Penne Arrabbiata
pasta.description: Penne pasta with arrabbiata sauce served with stir-fried veggies (optional)
instructions: In a pot of heavily salted boiling water, cook the pasta till al dente.
Drain the pasta and cool it with running water.
Blanch the tomatoes, remove their peels and blend them.
Heat oil in pan, add in chopped garlic, blended tomatoes, the tomato paste and cook them on low for 30 minutes.
Add in the cooked pasta and some pasta water and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish it with cheese and basil and optionally serve with your choice of grilled veggies.

soup.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
soup.description: Homely chicken noodle soup with lots of veggies and flavor!
instructions: In a thick-bottomed pan, heat some oil and saute chopped garlic for a minute or two.
Dice the chicken into cubes and add it to a pan and cook on medium heat for 5 minutes.
Add in roughly chopped carrots, celery and onion to the chicken and saute them for a couple of minutes.
Add in the stock, water as required and add in uncooked noodles.
Simmer the soup till the noodles and chicken are cooked properly.
Garnish it with chopped cilantro, lemon juice and season it with salt and pepper.
